textBeforeTable: Number of Patents Granted as Distributed by Year of Patent Grant, Breakout by Country of Origin (Table A1-1a) and by Ownership Category (Table A1-1b) Part A1 Tables A1-1a and A1-1b Patenting by Organizations 2009 PARTS A1, B Granted: 01/01/2009 - 12/31/2009 A Patent Technology Monitoring Team Report Separate U.S. Government agencies receiving 40 or more patents during the year are listed in the table in Part B. In calendar year 2009, the U.S. Government received 695 utility patents. Table A1-1b displays a breakout of 2009 patents by ownership category. Patenting By The U.S. Government in 2009 Additionally, a user may import this report file into spreadsheet software such as Microsoft Excel to facilitate printing. Such spreadsheet software also may facilitate sorting and further manipulation of the data. This report can be printed from an Internet browser. Microsoft Internet Explorer, version 7, works particularly well for printing this report using its "Shrink to Fit" option. Report Printing and the Use of Spreadsheet Software No attempt has been made to combine data based on subsidiary relationships. However, where possible, spelling variations and variations based on name changes (e.g., ESSO
